name: Variation Swatches Master Lite for WooCommerce
author: RedefiningTheWeb

sections.description:
Enhance the visual aesthetics of your products and the attributes of a variation to bestow an appealing look to your product page. It is a feature-packed extension to get a neat, polished, and sophisticated look for all variations on your WooCommerce store pages.

This user-friendly plugin allows you to select different attributes and styles to display the variations of all variable products. There are endless options and flexibility to customize the look and feel you want to achieve for the swatches- round or square shape, convert dropdown menus into images, and so much more.

Select a preferred style for the variations from several options grouped under different categories- color, images, buttons, and radio. It also allows the buyers on your website to add products to the shopping cart from the store gallery/Archive pages directly using the ‘Add to Cart’ button.

Make a smart move with PRO Version WooCommerce Variation Swatches Master

Core features

The Variation Swatches Master Lite for WooCommerce plugin includes the following features –

  • Convert all Dropdowns into Swatches Automatically
  • Swatches for Single Product Page
  • Color Variation Swatches for Single Page
  • Button Variation Swatches for Single Page
  • Rounded & Square Shape Variation for Swatches

Conditions & Restrictions

  • Choose Maximum Discount given amount
  • Time Validation (Discount Starts on and Ends on)
  • Exclude sale item from discount rule

Premium Features

  • Convert all Dropdowns into Swatches Automatically
  • Create Different Types of Swatches for Products
  • Create Unlimited Attributes
  • Swatches for Single Product Page
  • Create Unlimited Swatches
  • Image Variation Swatches for Single & Shop Page
  • Color / Multicolor Variation Swatches for Shop & Single Page
  • Button Variation Swatches for Shop & Single Page
  • Text Tooltip for Variation Swatches
  • Display Swatches for Shop / Archive Page
  • Rounded & Square Shape Variation for Swatches
  • Blur / Hide Variation for Out of Stock
  • Multiple Display Options for Swatches Types
  • Custom Attribute Settings
  • Styling Tooltip and Other Custom Sections
  • Display ‘Add to Cart’ Button at the Shop Page

Benefits of Using Our Premium Plugin

Maximize Sales

Boost sales on your store with attract festive and seasonal offers for returning customers based on their purchases history.

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WooCommerce Order Coupon, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Variation Swatches Master Lite for WooCommerce” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Variation Swatches Master Lite for WooCommerce you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Variation Swatches Master Lite for WooCommerce and uploading it to your web server via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
